name: Spykill week #1
description:
This is my 1st game of my personal challenge, week #1.

The purpose is to protect your player with your mouse and shoot all missiles, you have 10 lives and make sure you have the best score!

Play with your mouse and shoot all ennemies :)

Do not hesitate to comment.

I used P5PLAY.js as framework and pure JavaScript, Google Image and some free tiles as sprites.
